name: One Pin
desc: A very long pin, its tip is dull from overuse.

name: Foul Potion
desc: Everything about this potion seems foul, but at least it is worth drinking. Barely.
use: You drink the potion. It tastes like maggot cheese.

name: Apple of Desparation
desc: Is your soul worth living just a little longer?
use: You take a bite from the apple. It tastes like hope.

name: Obol
desc: An really old coin. Probably useful somewhere...
use: You throw money at the problem!

name: Demon Soul
desc: A soul filled with malevolent hatred. You really want to get rid of it
use: You consume the soul, and it makes you stronger. It also makes you feel like terrible.

name: Lost Soul
desc: A soul of a lost one. It's glow is captivating
use: You consume the soul, and it makes you stronger. You hope you're doing it a favor.

name: Corrupted Soul
desc: A swirling filth. It screams at you.
use: You consume the soul, and it makes you stronger. A grim smile crosses your face.

name: Heat Bone
desc: A bone with a burning core. Probably packs a punch
use: You hit the enemy with the bone! They burst into flame!
